page-contributing-translation-program-ac.page-contributing-translation-program-ac: The Translation Program is a collaborative effort and thousands of contributors have gotten involved by volunteering their time to help us make the website accessible in as many languages as possible.
This page is dedicated to acknowledging our translators and their efforts, highlighting our most outstanding contributors, and supporting them on their professional journeys.
All translators active in our project in Crowdin are featured on our contributors page.
The most active translators in a given period will also earn their place on the Translation Leaderboard.

Professional or upcoming translators, as well as translations students and linguists looking to add a new field of expertise, can request a Translator certificate, to certify their contributions to the website.
We want to acknowledge our translators and support them on their career paths. With this in mind, we have designed the ethereum.org translator certificate.

The certificate is intended for professional and upcoming translators who want to use it as a reference, prove their expertise in translating technical content or simply show their dedication to Ethereum.

If you have contributed to the Translation Program and at least 5,000 of your translated words have been approved, you can request your translator certificate by writing to us at translations@ethereum.org. Your message should include the link to your Crowdin account and your full name (or alias, if you prefer), which we will add to the certificate.
Acknowledgement of all the great work our translators do
Check out our full list of translators who dedicate their time and skills to help make Ethereum content available to everyone.
Community is at the heart of the ethereum.org Translation Program. Explore our full community of translators below.
Help us translate ethereum.org and earn a place on the Translator Leaderboard!

We want to feature outstanding translators based on recent activity as well as highlight our most impactful all-time contributors. Our leaderboard tracks data on the most active translators using a monthly, quarterly and all-time view, and are updated at the start of each month. Translators are placed on the leaderboards based on their number of ''winning'' words (number of translated words that are approved during the review).
Contributors to the Translation Program are eligible for different OATs (onchain achievement tokens) – non-fungible tokens that prove their participation in the ethereum.org Translation Program.
We have a number of different OATs available for translators, based on their activity.
If you have contributed to the translation effort in Crowdin, you have an OAT waiting for you!
Paste a link to your Crowdin account in the #🥇 | proof-of-contribution channel.
Wait for a member of our team to assign you the roles needed to claim your OATs.
You should only use self-custody wallets to claim OATs. Do not use exchange accounts or other accounts you do not hold the private keys to, as these will not allow you to access and manage your OATs.

page-contributing-translation-program-co.page-contributing-translation-program-co: We'd like to thank all of our contributors!
Community is at the heart of the ethereum.org Translation Program.
With thousands of community members contributing translations to our project, it is difficult to acknowledge everyone.

All translators are listed alphabetically based on their chosen name in Crowdin. If you are a translator and would like to use your real name, nickname, ENS domain, etc., you can change your Full Name in Crowdin.
A list of our translation contributors.

page-dapps.page-dapps-beginner-friendly-description: Programu gatuzi chache ni nzuri kwa anayeanza. Chunguza programu gatuzi chini.
page-dapps.page-dapps-collectibles-benefits-1-descr: Sanaa inapofanywa ishara kwenye Ethereum, umiliki unaweza kuthibitishwa kwa ajili ya wote kuona. Unaweza kufatilia safari ya kazi ya sanaa kutoka uundaji mpaka anaeimiliki sasa. Hii huzuia kugushi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-collectibles-benefits-2-descr:
Kulipa ili kutiririsha muziki au kununua kazi za sanaa ni haki zaidi kwa wasanii. Kwa Ethereum kuna haja ndogo ya waamuzi. Na kama wasuluhishi wanahitajika, gharama zao si za juu sana kwa sababu majukwaa hayahitaji kulipia miundombinu ya mtandao.
Muhtasari.
page-dapps.page-dapps-collectibles-benefits-3-descr: Huwezi kuzuiliwa kutumia dapp ambayo imefungamana na na anuani ya Etehreum, na sio jukwaa. Kwaio unaweza kuuza vitu kama michezo kwenye soko lolote la Ethereum, na siokweye soko la michezo peke yake.
page-dapps.page-dapps-collectibles-benefits-4-descr: Zana na bidhaa ambazo zinapatikana tayari ili uweze kuifanya sanaa ishara na uweze kuiuza. Na ishara zako zinaweza kuuzwa popote na kwenye majukwaa yote ya ishara ya Ethereum.
page-dapps.page-dapps-collectibles-benefits-descrip: Hizi ni programu zinazojikita katika umiliki wa kidijitali, kuogeza nafasi ya mavuno zaidi kwa waundaji na kuvumbua njia mpya za kuwekeza kwa waundaji unaowapenda na kazi zao.
page-dapps.page-dapps-collectibles-description: Hizi ni programu zinazojikita katika umiliki wa kidijitali, kuogeza nafasi ya mavuno zaidi kwa waundaji na kuvumbua njia mpya za kuwekeza kwa waundaji unaowapenda na kazi zao.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-1inch: Inakusaidia kukwepa bei ghali za kutelezza kwa kutafuta bei zinazofaa zaidi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-aave: Azima tokeni zako ili kupata riba na uondoe wakati wowote.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-ankr: Seti ya bidhaa mbalimbali za miundo msingi ya Web3 ya ujenzi, malipo, michezo na zaidi - yote kwenye kiambajengo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-api3: Vyanzo vya data vya bei vya mhusika wa kwanza vinavyoruhusu programu gatuzi (dApps) kwenye mitandao 10 (na kuendelea) kuunganishwa na data ya bei ya mali kwa wakati halisi, ikijumuisha bei za kripto na forex.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-arweave: Hifadhi data milele, endelevu, na ada moja tu ya mbele.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-async-art: Unda, kusanya na ufanye biashara #ProgrammableArt - picha za kidijitali zimegawanywa katika "Tabaka" ambazo unaweza kutumia kuathiri picha kwa ujumla. Kila bwana na Tabaka ni tokeni ya ERC721.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-audius: Majukwaa ya uturirishaji yaliogatuliwa. Wasikilizaji = pesa za waundaji, na sio lebo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-axie-infinit: Fanya biashara na viuimbe vipambanaji kwa jina Axies. Na jinshindie pesa unapocheza - iapatikana kwenye simu za rununu
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-balancer: Balancer ni kidhibiti cha kiotomatiki cha potifolio na ni jukwaa la biashara.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-brave: Jipatie ishara kwa kuvinjari na kutegemeza waundaji uwapendao.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-cent: Mtandao wa kijamii unapata pesa kwa kuchapisha NFT.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-compound: Azima tokeni zako ili kupata riba na uondoe wakati wowote.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-convex: Convex inaruhusu watoa huduma wa ukwasi wa Curve kupata ada za uuzaji na kudai mapato yalioongezwa ya CRV bila kuzifunga CRV yao.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-cryptopunks: Nunua, weka zabuni, na toa punks (vibonzo) vya kuuza - moja ya vifurushi vya mwanzo kwenye Ethereum.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-cryptovoxels: Unda nyumba za sanaa, jenga maduka, na nunua ardhi - Ulimwengu wa mtandaoni wa Ethereum.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-cyberconnect: Protokali ya picha ya kijamii iliyogatuliwa inayosaidia programu gatuzi kuanzisha athari za mtandao na kujenga uzoefu wa kijamii ulio binafsi
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-dark-forest: Jishindie sayari bila ukomo, zinazoundwa kwa utaratibu, kwa ulimwengu maalumu wa kriptografia.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-decentraland: Kusanya, fanya biashara kwenye ardhi ya mtandaoni kwenye ulimwengu wa mtandaoni unaoweza kuvinjari.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-ens: Majina rafiki ya anunuani za Ethereum na tovuti zilizogatuliwa.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-foundation: Wekeza kwenye matoleo ya pekee ya sanaa za kidijitali na fanya biashara na wanunuzi wengine.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-gitcoin: Jipatie kripto kwa kufanya kazi kwenye programu zilizo na vyanzo vya wazi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-gitcoin-gran: Ufadhili wa watu wengi kwa ajili ya miradi ya wana-Ethereum na michango iliokuzwa
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-gm: Jukwaa la kila kitu kwa mazungumzo, majukwaa, na sauti ambalo linashiriki mapato na watengeneza maudhui wake
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-gods-unchain: Kadi ya kimkakati ya mchezo wa biashara. Jishindie kadi kwa kucheza na unaweza kuuza kwenye maisha halisi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-golem: Pata nguvu ya kompyuta za jamii ama kodisha rasilimali zako mwenyewe.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-graph: Kielezo cha itifaki kwa ajili ya kutafuta mtandao kama Ethereum na IPFS.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-ipfs: Mtu-kwa-mtu mtandao wa kidijitali uliobuniwa kuhifadhu na kukuza maarifa ya ulimwengu kwa kufanya tovuti kuweza kuboreshwa, imilivu na ya uwazi zaidi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-radicle: Ushirikishaji wa msimbo wa rika-kwa-rika ulio salama bila viunganishi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-kyberswap: Badilisha na pata kwa bei poa.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-kiwinews: Find interesting Ethereum news, articles, and products curated for builders by builders. Discuss them with fellow devs, founders, and investors.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-lido: Imerahisishwa na salama kuweka dhamana kwa jili ya mali za kidijitali.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-loopring: Jukwa la rika-kwa-rika lililojengwa kwa ajili ya kasi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-marble-cards: Unda na uza kadi za kidijitali za kipekee kulingana na URL.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-matcha: Inatafuta majukwaa tofauti tofauti kukupatia wewe bei ilobora zaidi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-meeds: Vituo kwa ajili ya jamii ya tovuti ya tatu kwa ajili ya umri wa kazi za ugatuzi. Zawadi inatolewa kwa usawa na kwa uwazi kwa michango muhimu.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-mirror: Imejengwa juu ya tovuti ya tatu, kioo kinachokuza machapisho yanayosukuma mipaka ya kuandika mtandaoni
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-multichain: Njia kuu ya tovuti ya tatu. Ni miundombinu imeundwa kwa ajili ya kuingia kufanya shughuli kwenye mnyororo mwingine.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-nifty-gatewa: Nunua kazi za wasanii, wakimbiaji, chapa, na waundaji wa juu kwenye mnyororo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-summerfi: Uza, kopa na weka akiba na Dai, sarafu-imara ya Ethereum.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-opensea: Nunua, uza, gundua na fanya biashara ya bidhaa zenye ukomo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-opera: Tuma kripto kutoka kwenye kivinjari chako kwenda kwa wafanya biashara, watumiaji wengine, na programu.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-poap: Kusanya NFT ili kuthibitisha ulikuwepo sehemu tofauti ya mtandaonmi au matukio halisi ya uso kwa uso,. Zitumie kujiunga kwenye bahati nasibu, piga kura, shiriki, au jisifu tu.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-polymarket: Weka dau juiu ya matokeo. Fanya biashara juu ya taarifa za masoko.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-pooltogether: Bahati nasibu usioweza kuipoteza. Tuzo za kila wiki.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-index-coop: Hazina ya faharasa ya crypto ambayo hutoa kwingineko yako kufichua tokeni za juu za DeFi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-nexus-mutual: Chanjo bila kampuni ya bima. Jilinde dhidi ya hitilafu na udukuzi wa mikataba mahiri.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-etherisc: Kiolezo cha bima iliyogatuliwa ambayo mtu yeyote anaweza kutumia kuunda bima yake mwenyewe.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-zapper: Fuatilia kwingineko yako na utumie anuwai ya bidhaa za DeFi kutoka kiolesura kimoja.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-zerion: Dhibiti kwingineko yako na utathmini kwa urahisi kila kipengee cha DeFi kwenye soko.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-rotki: Zana ya ufuatiliaji wa jalada huria, uchanganuzi, uhasibu na kuripoti kodi ambayo inaheshimu faragha yako.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-krystal: Jukwaa moja kwa linalokupa ufikiaji wa huduma za DeFi uzipendazo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-rarible: Unda, uuze na ununue vifurushi vya ishara.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-request-fina: Seti ya zanaa za kifedha kwa ajili ya kripto za ankara, malipo ya mishahara na gharama.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-rubic: Kiunganisha teknolojia cha mwingiliio-wa-mnyororo kwa watumiaji na programu gatuzi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-sablier: Pata mtiririko wa hela katika wakati halisi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-spatial: Unda picha yako ikiwa na chaguzi zako kwenye ulimwengu wa 3D
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-spruce: Seti ya programu za uwazi (programu huria) kuacha uthibiti wa utambulisho na data pale ambapo: ipo mikononi mwa watumiaji.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-status: Imebuniwa kuruhusu uhuru wa mawazo, kulinda haki za faragha, kulinda maongezi, na kuinua uhuru wa watu.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-superrare: Nunua kazi za sanaa za kiidjitali kutka kwa wasanii au masoko ya sekondari.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-synthetix: Synthetix ni itifaki ya utoaji wa na ufanyaji biashara wa amali asili
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-uniswap: Badilisha ishara kiurahisis au toa ishara kupata zawadi kwa silimia % kadhaa.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-xmtp: Tuma ujumbe baina ya akaunti ya kiambajengo, Ikiwemo jumbe za faragha, tahadhari, matangazo, na zaidi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-yearn: Yearn Finance ni mkusanyaji wa mapato. Kupatia watu binafsi, DAO na itifaki nyinginezo njia ya kuweka mali ya kidijitali na kupokea mapato.
page-dapps.page-dapps-editors-choice-dark-forest: Cheza dhidi ya wengine kujipatia sayari na jaribishe upanga unaovuja wa Ethereum inayotanuka/teknolojia binafsi. Labda kwa wale wanaoitambua Ethereum tayari.
page-dapps.page-dapps-editors-choice-foundation: Wekeza katika utamaduni. Nunua, fanya biashara na uza kazi za kipekee za kidijitali na mitindo kutoka kwa wasanii, wanamuziki na chapa za ajabu.
page-dapps.page-dapps-editors-choice-pooltogether: Nunua tikiti ya bahati nasibu isiyo na hasara. Kila wiki, riba inayotokana na kundi zima la tikiti hutumwa kwa mshindi mmoja wa bahati. Rudisha pesa zako wakati wowote upendao.
page-dapps.page-dapps-editors-choice-uniswap:
Badilisha tokeni zako kwa urahisi. Kipendwa cha jumuiya kinachokuruhusu kufanya biashara ya tokeni na watu kwenye mtandao.
Muhtasari.
page-dapps.page-dapps-explore-dapps-description: Prograu nyingi zilizogatuliwa(dapps) bado ziko kwenye majaribio, upimaji wa uwezekano wa mitandaao iliogatuliwa. Lakii kumekuwepo na wahamaji wa mwanzo waliofanikiwa katika teknolojia, uchumi, michezo na vitengo mbali mbali vya viavyokusanyika.
page-dapps.page-dapps-features-1-description: Mara msimbo wa dapp utakapozinduliwa kwenye Ethereum, haiitawezekana kuuondoa. Na mtu yeyote anaweza kutumia huduma za dapps. Hata kama timu ilio nyuma ya dapp imekutoa bado unaweza kuitumia. Pale inapokua kwenye ethereum, inakaa hapo hapo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-features-2-description: Huwezi kuzuiliwa kutuia dapp au kuwasilisha miamala. Kwa mfano Twitter ingekua kwenye Ethereum, hamna ambae angeweza kuzuia akaunti yako au kukuzuia wewe kuendelea ku-tweet.
page-dapps.page-dapps-features-3-description: Kwa sababu Ethereum ina ETH, malipo yanatoka kwa Ethereum. Wasanidi programu hawahitaji kutumia muda kujumuika na watoa huduma wengine wa malipo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-features-4-description: Msimbo wa Dapp mara nyingi uko wazi na unaweza kutumika kwa chaguomsingi. Timu hujenga mara kwa mara kwa kutumia kazi ya timu nyingine. Ikiwa ungependa kuruhusu watumiaji kubadilishana tokeni kwenye dapp yako, unaweza tu kuunganisha msimbo mwingine wa dapps.
page-dapps.page-dapps-features-5-description: Kwa dapps nyingi, huhitaji kushiriki utambulisho wako wa ulimwengu halisi. Akaunti yako ya Ethereum ndiyo kuingia kwako na unahitaji tu mkoba.
page-dapps.page-dapps-features-6-description: Kriptografia huhakikisha kwamba wavamizi hawawezi kughushi miamala na mwingiliano mwingine wa dapp kwa niaba yako. Unaidhinisha vitendo vya dapp ukitumia akaunti yako ya Ethereum - kwa kawaida kupitia mkoba wako - ili hati zako zisalie salama.
page-dapps.page-dapps-features-7-description: Pale ambapo dapp inakua hai kwenye Ethereum, itaanguka pale tu ethereum yenyewe itakapoanguka. Mitandao ya ujazo wa Ethereum ina sifa mbaya kwa washambuliaji maana haipenyeki.
page-dapps.page-dapps-finance-benefits-1-descriptio: Huduma za kiuchumi zinazoendeshwa juu ya Ethereum hazihitaji usajili. kama una pesa na mtandao uko vizuri kufanya shughuli zako.
page-dapps.page-dapps-finance-benefits-2-descriptio: Kuna ulimwengu mzima wa ishara ambazo unaweza kuwasiliana nazo kwenye bidhaa hizi za kifedha. Watu wanajenga tokeni mpya juu ya Ethereum kila wakati.
page-dapps.page-dapps-finance-benefits-3-descriptio: Timu imejenga sarafu-imara yenye mwendo mdogo wa mabadiliko ya bei ya sarafu za kripto. Hii inaruhusu wewe kufanya uchuguzi na kutumia kripto bila ya hatari na kutokuwa na uhakika.
page-dapps.page-dapps-finance-benefits-4-descriptio: Bidhaa za kifedha katika nafasi ya Ethereum zote ni za msimu na zinaendana. Mipangilio mipya ya moduli hizi inagonga soko kila wakati, na kuongeza kile unachoweza kufanya na crypto yako.
page-dapps.page-dapps-finance-benefits-description: Je, ni nini kuhusu Ethereum inayoruhusu maombi ya fedha yaliyogatuliwa kustawi?
page-dapps.page-dapps-finance-description: Hizi ni programu zinazolenga kujenga huduma za kifedha kwa kutumia sarafu za siri. Wanatoa upendeleo wa kukopesha, kukopa, kupata riba na malipo ya kibinafsi - hakuna data ya kibinafsi inayohitajika.
page-dapps.page-dapps-gaming-benefits-1-description: Iwe ni ardhi pepe au kadi za biashara, bidhaa zako zinaweza kuuzwa kwenye masoko ya bidhaa zinazokusanywa. Vipengee vyako vya ndani ya mchezo vina thamani ya ulimwengu halisi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-gaming-benefits-1-title: Vipengele vya mchezo mara mbili kama ishara
page-dapps.page-dapps-gaming-benefits-2-description: Unamiliki vitu vyako, na katika hali zingine maendeleo yako, sio kampuni za mchezo. Kwa hivyo hutapoteza chochote ikiwa kampuni inayoendesha mchezo imeshambuliwa, itakumbwa na hitilafu ya seva, au itasambaratishwa.
page-dapps.page-dapps-gaming-benefits-3-description: Kwa njia hiyo hiyo malipo ya Ethereum yanapatikana kwa mtu yeyote ili kuthibitisha, michezo inaweza kutumia ubora huu ili kuhakikisha haki. Kwa nadharia, kila kitu kinaweza kuthibitishwa kutoka kwa idadi ya vibao muhimu hadi saizi ya kifua cha vita cha mpinzani.
page-dapps.page-dapps-gaming-benefits-description: Je, ni nini kuhusu Ethereum inayoruhusu maombi ya fedha yaliyogatuliwa kustawi?
page-dapps.page-dapps-gaming-description: Hizi ni programu zinazoangazia uundaji wa ulimwengu pepe na kupambana na wachezaji wengine kwa kutumia mkusanyiko ambao una thamani ya ulimwengu halisi.
page-dapps.page-dapps-get-some-eth-description: Vitendo vya Dapp vinagharimu ada ya ununuzi
page-dapps.page-dapps-get-started-subtitle: Kujaribu programu gatuzi utaitaji mkoba na kiasi cha ETH. Mkoba utakuwezesha wewe kuunganisha, au kuingia ndani, Na utahitaji ETH kulipa ada ya muamala.
page-dapps.page-dapps-hero-header: Zana na huduma zinazoendeshwa na Ethereum
page-dapps.page-dapps-hero-subtitle: Dapps ni harakati inayokua ya programu zinazotumia Ethereum kutatiza miundo ya biashara au kuvumbua mpya.
page-dapps.page-dapps-how-dapps-work-p1: Programu gatuzi ina miundombinu yake ya msimbo wa nyuma (mikataba erevu) kufanya kazi kama mtandao gatuzi na sio seva za umoja. Wnatumia.
page-dapps.page-dapps-how-dapps-work-p2: Mkataba erevu ni kama seti ya sheria zinazotumika kwa kila mtu kuona na kutekelezwa kulingana na sheria hizo. Hebu fikiria mashine ya kuuza: ikiwa utaisambaza kwa fedha za kutosha na uteuzi sahihi, utapata bidhaa unayotaka. Na kama vile mashine za kuuza, kandarasi mahiri zinaweza kuhifadhi pesa kama vile akaunti yako ya Ethereum. Hii inaruhusu msimbo kupatanisha makubaliano na shughuli.
page-dapps.page-dapps-how-dapps-work-p3: Mara dapps zinapotumika kwenye mtandao wa Ethereum huwezi kuzibadilisha. Dapps zinaweza kugatuliwa kwa sababu zinadhibitiwa na mantiki iliyoandikwa kwenye mkataba, si mtu binafsi au kampuni.
page-dapps.page-dapps-learn-callout-description: Tovuti yetu ya wasanidi programu wa jumuiya ina hati, zana, na mifumo ya kukusaidia kuanza kuunda dapp.
page-dapps.page-dapps-learn-callout-image-alt: Kielelezo cha mkono ukiunda nembo ya ETH kwa matofali aina ya lego.
page-dapps.page-dapps-magic-behind-dapps-descriptio: Dapps inaweza kuhisi kama programu za kawaida. Lakini nyuma ya pazia wana sifa maalum kwa sababu wanarithi nguvu zote za Ethereum. Hiki ndicho kinachofanya dapps kuwa tofauti na programu.
page-dapps.page-dapps-magic-behind-dapps-link: Ni nini kinachofanya Ethereum kuwa nzuri?
page-dapps.page-dapps-metaverse-benefits-descriptio: Je, ni nini kuhusu Ethereum inayoruhusu metaverse kustawi?
page-dapps.page-dapps-metaverse-benefits-1-descript: Ya kipekee kwenye vitu vya mchezo ambayo inamilikiwa na watumiaji na inaweza tumika kati ya ulimwengu sadifu na masoko yanayo toa msaada wa viwango ivyo.
page-dapps.page-dapps-metaverse-benefits-2-descript: Utambulisho unamilikiwa na mtumiaji mwenyenafasi nyingi za kuchunguza na kuunda mitandao ya kijamii kupitia ulimwengu sadifu.
page-dapps.page-dapps-metaverse-description: Hizi ni programu zinazo wezesha mtumiaji kushiriki kwa uhuru kwenye ulimwengu sadifu. Watumiaji wanaweza unda mitandao binafsi na kuchukua umiliki wa mali za kidijitali
page-dapps.page-dapps-social-description: Hizi ni programu zilizo jikita kwenye kutengeneza mitandao ya kijamii kutumia teknolojia ya utambulisho wa ugatuzi ambapo utambulisho wa kidijitali na grafu za kijamii zinamilikiwa na watumiaji.
page-dapps.page-dapps-technology-description: Hizi ni programu ambazo zinaangazia ugatuaji wa zana za wasanidi programu, kujumuisha mifumo ya kriptoeconomic katika teknolojia iliyopo, na kuunda soko kwa kazi huria ya ukuzaji.
page-dapps.page-dapps-wallet-callout-description: Pochi ni dapps pia. Tafuta moja kulingana na vipengele vinavyokufaa.
page-dapps.page-dapps-warning-header: Mara zote fanya utafitit wako mwenyewe
page-dapps.page-dapps-warning-message: Ethereum ni teknolojia mpya na matumizi mengi ni mapya. Kabla ya kuweka kiasi kikubwa cha pesa, hakikisha unaelewa hatari.
page-dapps.page-dapps-more-on-nft-button: Zaidi juu ya vifurushi vilivofanya tokeni/ishara
page-dapps.page-dapps-more-on-nft-gaming-button: Zaidi juu ya michezo ya ndani iliofanya tokeni
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-pwn: Mikopo rahisi iliyoauniwa na tokeni yoyote ama NFT kwenye Ethereum.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-curve: Curve ni dex iliyojikita kwenye sarafu-imara
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-dodo: DODO ni mtoaji wa ukwasi kwenye mnyororo, ambae anatumia algoriti ya mtengeneza soko makini (PMM)
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-artblocks: Art Blocks imedhamiria kuleta jumla ya kazi nzuri zilizozalishwa na sanaa kwenye uhai
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-augur: Bashirir juu ya matokeo ya michezo, uschumi na matukio mbali mbali ulimwenguni.
page-dapps.page-dapps-dapp-description-token-sets: Mikakati ya uwekezaji ya Crypto ambayo inasawazisha kiotomatiki.

page-developers-docs.docs-nav-development-frameworks-descript: Tools that make developing with Ethereum easier
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-development-networks-descriptio: Local blockchain environments used to test dapps before deployment
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-ethereum-client-apis-descriptio: Convenience libraries that allow your web app to interact with Ethereum and smart contracts
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-evm-description: The EVM handles all the computation on the Ethereum network
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-gas-description: Computational power required to process transactions, paid for in ETH by transaction senders
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-integrated-development-environm: The best environments to write dapp code
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-intro-to-the-stack-description: An overview of the Ethereum/web3 stack
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-mev-description: How value is extracted from the Ethereum blockchain beyond the block reward
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-networks-description: Implementations of Ethereum including test networks
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-nodes-and-clients-description: The individuals participating in the network and the software they run to verify transactions

page-developers-docs.docs-nav-programming-languages-descripti: How to get started with Ethereum using languages you may already know

page-developers-docs.docs-nav-smart-contract-security-descrip: Best practices for managing smart contract attacks and vulnerabilities
page-developers-docs.docs-nav-smart-contract-formal-verificat: An introduction of formal verification in the context of Ethereum smart contracts

page-developers-docs.docs-nav-data-structures-and-encoding-de: Explanation of the data structures and encoding schema used across the Ethereum stack
page-developers-docs.page-calltocontribute-desc-1: If you're an expert on the topic and want to contribute, edit this page and sprinkle it with your wisdom.
page-developers-docs.page-calltocontribute-desc-2: You'll be credited and you'll be helping the Ethereum community!
page-developers-docs.page-calltocontribute-desc-4: Questions? Ask us in the #content channel on our

page-developers-docs.banner-page-incomplete: Ukurasa huu haujakamilika na tungependa msaada wako. Hariri ukurasa huu na kuongeza chochote unachofikiri kinaweza kua na manufaa kwa wengine.

page-developers-index.page-developer-meta-title: Rasilomali za Msanisi Programu kwenye Ethereum
page-developers-index.page-developers-about-desc: ethereum.org iko hapa kukusaidia kujenga na Ethereum na nyaraka juu ya dhana za msingi na pia safu ya maendeleo. Kwa kuongeza kuna mafunzo ya kukufanya uweze kujiendeleza.
page-developers-index.page-developers-about-desc-2: Iliyotiwa moyo na Mtandao wa Wasanidi Programu wa Mozilla, tulifikiri Ethereum inahitaji mahali pa kuweka bidhaa na rasilimali bora za msanidi programu. Kama marafiki wetu huko Mozilla, kila kitu hapa ni chanzo-wazi na tayari kwako kutanua na kuboresha.
page-developers-index.page-developers-block-desc: Makundi ya shughuli zilizoongezwa kwenye pande la mnyororo
page-developers-index.page-developers-block-explorers-desc: Lango lako la data za Ethereum
page-developers-index.page-developers-dev-env-desc: IDEs zinazo faa kwa maendeleo ya dapp
page-developers-index.page-developers-feedback: Ikiwa una maoni yoyote, tuwasiliane kupitia GitHub au kwenye seva yetu ya Discord.
page-developers-index.page-developers-gas-desc: Ether inayohitajika kutoa nguvu kwa ajili ya mapatano
page-developers-index.page-developers-improve-ethereum-desc: Kama ethereum.org, hati hizi ni juhudi za jamii. Unda PR(Vuta ombi) ikiwa utaona makosa, nafasi ya kuboresha, au fursa mpya za kusaidia watengenezaji wa Ethereum.
page-developers-index.page-developers-intro-ether-desc: Utangulizi wa sarafu ya krypto na Ether
page-developers-index.page-developers-intro-dapps-desc: Utangulizi wa programu zisiozo na mipaka
page-developers-index.page-developers-js-libraries-desc: Utumiaji wa javascript kuingiliana na mikatabaerevu
page-developers-index.page-developers-learn-desc: Soma juu ya dhana za msingi na mpororo wa Ethereum na hati zetu
page-developers-index.page-developers-learn-tutorials-desc: Jifunze utengenezaji wa Ethereum hatua kwa hatua kutoka kwa wajenzi ambao tayari wameufanya.
page-developers-index.page-developers-meta-desc: Nyaraka, mafunzo, na zana kwa wasanidi programu wanaojenga juu ya Ethereum.
page-developers-index.page-developers-mev-desc: Utangulizi wa thamani inayoweza kutolewa kwa mchimbaji
page-developers-index.page-developers-mining-desc: Jinsi matofali mapya yanavyoundwa na makubaliano kufikiwa
page-developers-index.page-developers-networks-desc: Muhtasari wa Mtandao Mkuu na mitandao ya majaribio
page-developers-index.page-developers-node-clients-desc: Jinsi matofali na miamala inavyothibitishwa kwenye mtandao
page-developers-index.page-developers-oracle-desc: Kutoka nje ya mnyororo-data katika mikataba yako erevu
page-developers-index.page-developers-smart-contract-security-: Hatua za usalama za kuzingatia wakati wa utengenezwaji wa mikataba erevu
page-developers-index.page-developers-setup-desc: Andaa mpororo wako tayari kwa ujenzi kwa kusanidi mazingira ya utengenezaji.
page-developers-index.page-developers-smart-contracts-desc: Mantiki nyuma ya dapps - makubaliano yanayojitekeleza
page-developers-index.page-developers-speedrunethereum-title: Learn all the most important concepts by building on Ethereum
page-developers-index.page-developers-start-desc: Unataka kujaribu kwanza, uliza maswali baadaye?
page-developers-index.page-developers-storage-desc: Jinsi ya kushughulikia uhifadhi wa dapp
page-developers-index.page-developers-subtitle: Mwongozo wa wajenzi wa Ethereum. Umeundwa na wajenzi, kwa wajenzi.
page-developers-index.page-developers-token-standards-desc: Muhtasari wa viwango vya mithili iliyokubalika
page-developers-index.page-developers-web3-desc: Jinsi ulimwengu wa wavuti-3 wa maendeleo ni tofauti
page-developers-index.page-developers-networking-layer-desc: Introduction to the Ethereum networking layer
page-developers-index.page-developers-data-structures-and-enco: Introduction to the data structures and encoding schema used in the Ethereum stack
page-developers-index.alt-eth-blocks: Kielelezo cha matofali yaliopangwa kama nembo ya ETH

page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-bloomtech-descriptio: Kozi ya BloomTech Web3 itakufundisha ujuzi wanaotafuta waajiri kutoka kwa wahandisi.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-bootcamps-desc: Kozi za mtandaoni zilizolipiwa zitakuwezesha haraka.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-capture-the-ether-de: Kamata Ether ni mchezo ambao utadukua mikataba erevu ya Ethereum ili kujifunza kuhusu usalama.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-node-guardians-descr: Node Guardians is a gamified educational platform that immerses web3 developers in fantasy-themed quests to master Solidity, Cairo, Noir, and Huff programming.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-coding-subtitle: Vifaa hivi vitakusaidia kufanya majaribio ya Ethereum kama ungependa maingiliano zaidi wakati wa kujifunza.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-consensys-academy-de: Kamabi ya kujifunzia ya usanidi programu za Ethereum mtandaoni.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-cryptozombies-descri: Jifunze Solidity kwa kujenga mchezo wa watu wa kutisha.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-dapp-world-descripti: A blockchain upskilling ecosystem, including courses, quizzes, hands-on practice, and weekly contests.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-documentation-desc: Unataka kujifunza zaidi? Nenda kwenye nyaraka zetu kupata maelezo unayohitaji.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-eth-dot-build-descri: Sanduku la kuelimisha kuhusu web3, ikijumuisha mtindo wa kuprogramu kwa kuvuta-na-kudondosha na ni vifaa vya kujengea vilivyo huria.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-ethernauts-descripti: Maliza viwango vyote kwa kudukua mikataba erevu.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-metaschool-descripti: Become a Web3 Developer by building & shipping dApps.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-game-tutorials: Mafunzo kwa njia ya mchezo wa mwingiliano
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-game-tutorials-desc: Jifunze huku unacheza. Mafunzo haya yatakufundisha vitu vyote vya msingi kwa kutumia gameplay.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-meta-desc: Zana za usimbuaji za wavuti na kujifunza kwa kuingiliana utakusaidia kujaribu uundaji wa Ethereum.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-atlas-description: Write, test, and deploy smart contracts in minutes with the Atlas IDE.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-questbook-descriptio: Madunzo ya kasi binafsi lujifunza Web 3.0 kwa kujenga
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-remix-description: Unda, tuma na simamia mikataba erevu ya Ethereum. Pata mafunzo na programu-jalizi ya Learneth.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-remix-description-2: Remix na Replit ni zaidi ya eneo la majaribio, wasanidi programu wanaweza kuandika, kukusanya na kupeleka mikataba erevu mtandaoni kwa kuzitumia.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-replit-description: Mazingira yanayoweza kubalishwa kulingana na mahitaji ya Etehreum yenye kasi ya upakiaji, kukagua makosa, na misaada ya ukaguzu wa mtandao ya kiwango cha juu.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-chainIDE-description: Get started on your journey to Web3 by writing smart contracts for Ethereum with ChainIDE. Use the built-in templates to learn and save time.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-tenderly-description: Tenderly Sandbox is a prototyping environment where you can write, execute, and debug smart contracts in the browser using Solidity and JavaScript.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-sandbox-desc: Hivi visanduku vitakupa nafasi ya kufanya majaribio ya uandishi wa mikataba erevu na kuielewa Ethereum.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-speed-run-ethereum-d: Speed Run Ethereum is a set of challenges to test your Solidity knowledge using Scaffold-ETH
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-studio-description: Mfunzo ya wavuti yenye mazingira jumuishi ya uundaji katika ujenzi na majaribio ya mikataba erevu, na kujenga mfumo wa mbele kwa ajili yao.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-vyperfun-description: Jifunze Vyper kwa kuunda mchezo wa Pokémon.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-nftschool-descriptio: Chunguza nini kinaendelea na ishara-zisizokuvu, au NFT kutoka kwa mafundi.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-platzi-description: Learn how to build dapps on Web3 and master all the skills needed to be a blockchain developer.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-alchemy-university-d: Develop your web3 career through courses, projects and code.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-learnweb3-descriptio: LearnWeb3 is a free, high quality education platform to go from zero to hero in web3 development.
page-developers-learning-tools.page-learning-tools-cyfrin-updraft-descr: Learn smart contract development for all skill levels and security audits.
page-developers-learning-tools.alt-eth-blocks: Kielelezo cha matofali yaliopangwa kama nembo ya ETH

page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-brownie-desc: Uundaji ulio na misingi ya Python na mfumo wa kufanyia majaribio ya mikataba erervu inayolenga Mashine ya Mtandaoni ya Ethereum.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-kurtosis-desc: A container-based toolkit for easily configuring and spinning up a multi-client Ethereum testnet for rapid local dApp development, prototyping, and testing.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-epirus-desc: Jukwaa la kukuza, kupeleka na kufuatilia programu za blockchain kwenye Mashine ya Mtandaoni ya Java
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-eth-app-desc: Unda programu zinazoendeshwa na Ethereum kwa amri moja. Inakuja na matoleo mengi ya mifumo ya UI na violezo vya DeFi kuchagua.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-eth-app-logo-alt: Tengeneza nembo ya programu ya Eth
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-foundry-desc: A blazing fast, portable and modular toolkit for Ethereum application development written in Rust.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-framework-feature: Vipengele vya kuunda mfano wa mnyororo wa bloku.
Huduma za kukusanya na kujaribu mikataba yako mahiri.
Viongezi vya ukuzaji wa mteja ili kuunda programu yako inayomkabili mtumiaji ndani ya mradi/hazina sawa.
Mipangilio ya kuunganisha kwenye mitandao ya Ethereum na kupeleka kandarasi, iwe kwa mfano unaoendeshwa ndani ya nchi, au mojawapo ya mitandao ya umma ya Ethereum.
Usambazaji wa programu uliogatuliwa - miunganisho na chaguo za hifadhi kama vile IPFS.
Miundo hii inakuja na utendaji mwingi wa nje ya sanduku, kama:
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-frameworks-desc: Tunapendekeza uchague mfumo, haswa ikiwa ndio kwanza unaanza. Kuunda dapp kamili kunahitaji vipande tofauti vya teknolojia. Mifumo inajumuisha vipengele vingi vinavyohitajika au kutoa mifumo rahisi ya programu-jalizi ili kuchagua zana unazotaka.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-hardhat-desc: Hardhat ni mazingira ya maendeleo ya Ethereum kwa wataalamu.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-openZeppelin-desc: Punguza muda wa kufabya kazi kwa kuandaa, kusasisha, kuzindua na kuingiliana na mikataba erevu kwa kutumia kiolesura cha mstari wa amri tuliotengeneza.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-scaffold-eth-desc: Ethers + hardhat + React: Ni kila kitu unachohitaji ili kuanza kujenga programu zilizogatuliwa zinazopewa nguvu na mikataba erevu
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-meta-desc: Muongozo wa kufuata katika kuchagua msururu utakaotumia kufanya uundaji kwenye Ethereum.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-meta-title: Uanzishaji rafiki wa eneo la uundaji wa Ethereum
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-subtitle: Kama uko tayari kuanza kujenga, ni muda wa kuchagua msururu sasa.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-subtitle-2: Vifaa na mifumo inayoweza kukusaidia kujenga programu za Ethereum ziko hapa.
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-setup-title: Anzisha eneo lako rafiki kwaajili ya uundaji
page-developers-local-environment.page-local-environment-solidity-template: Kiolezo cha GitHub kilichojengwa tayari kwa ajili ya mikataba erevu ya Solidity utakayojenga. Inajumuisha mtandao wa Hardhat, Waffle kwa ajili ya kufanya majaribio, Ethers kwa ajili ya utekelezaji wa pochi, na mengine mengi.

page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-listing-policy-intro: Before you submit a tutorial please read our listing policy.
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-create-an-issue-desc: Fill out the issue template outlining your tutorial.
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-subtitle: Welcome to our curated list of community tutorials.
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorial-tags-error: There are no tutorials with all your chosen tags yet
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorials-meta-description: Browse and filter vetted Ethereum community tutorials by topic.
page-developers-tutorials.page-find-wallet-try-removing: Jaribu kuondoa kipengele kimoja ama viwili
page-developers-tutorials.page-tutorials-env-banner: Don't commit .env! Please make sure never to share or expose your .env file with anyone, as you are compromising your secrets in doing so. If you are using version control, add your .env to a gitignore file.

page-eth.page-eth-buy-some-desc: Ni kawaida kuchanganya Ethereum na ETH. Ethereum ni kiambajengo na ETH ni thamani kuu ya Ethereum. ETH ndio kitu unatazamia kuunua.
page-eth.page-eth-cat-img-alt: Mchoro wa nembo ya ETH ikiwa na ishara za mabadiliko ya paka
page-eth.page-eth-collectible-tokens-desc: Ishara zinazowakilisha mchezo unaokusanyika, kipande na sanaa, au mali nyingine ya kipekee. Kwa kawaida hujulikana kama ishara zisizo-kuvu ama kwa kifupisho cha lugha ya kiingereza (NFTs).
page-eth.page-eth-cryptography-desc: Hela ya mtandao ni mpya katika jamii ila iko salama na inalindwa na kriptographia iliohakikishwa. Hii inalinda mikoba yako, ETH yako, na miamala yako.
page-eth.page-eth-currency-for-apps: Ni sarafu ya programu za Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-currency-for-future: Sarafu kwa ajili ya ulimwengu wa dijitali wa kesho
page-eth.page-eth-description: ETH ni sarafu ya kripto. Ni hela adimu ya kidijitali ambayo unaweza kuitumia mtandaoni -- sawa sawa na Bitcoin. Kama wewe ni mpya kwenye kripto, maelezo haya yatakuonyesha tofauti kati ya ETH na sarfu zetu za jadi au tulizozoea kuongozwa na serikali.
page-eth.page-eth-flexible-amounts-desc: ETH inagawanyika mapaka desimali 18 kwahiyo huitaji kununua ETH 1 nzima. Unaweza kununua sehemu kila baada ya mda -unaweza kununua kidogo mpaka 0.000000000000000001 ETH kama unataka.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels: ETH ni mafuta na inalinda Ethereum
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-desc: ETH ni damu ya Ethereum. Unapotuma ETH ama kutumia programu za Ethereum, utalipa tozo katika ETH ili utumie mtandao wa Ethereum. Hizi tozo ni motisha kwa mzalishaji wa vitalu kufanya mchakato na kuthibitisha unachojaribu kufanya.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-desc-2: Wathibitishaji ni kama watunza rekodi wa Ethereum-wanakagua na kuhakikisha kwamba hakuna anayedanganya. Wanachaguliwa kwa nasibu kuchagua kundi la miamala. Wathibitishaji wanaofanya kazi hii wanazawadiwa kiwango kidogo cha ETH mpya.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-desc-3: Kazi ambayo wathibitishaji wanafanya, na fedha wanazoweka dhamana, huongeza usalama na kufanya Ethereum kua huru na kuepuka mashirika ya kati.
page-eth.page-eth-fuels-staking: Unaposimamisha hisa zako za ETH, unasaidia kulinda Ethereum na unapata riba. Kwenye mfumo huu, utete wa kupoteza ETH hufukuza wavamizi.
page-eth.page-eth-gov-tokens-desc: Ishara zinazowakilisha nguvu ya kupiga kura kwenye mashirika yaliogatuliwa.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc: ETH inathamani katika njia tofauti kwa watu tofauti.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-2: Kwa watumiaji wa Ethereum, ETH ina thamani kwasababu inakuruhusu kulipia ada za muamala.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-3: Wengine wanaiona kama ghala la kidijatili kwasababu ya uundaji wa ETH mpya unashuka chini taratibu mda unavyokwenda.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-4: Hivi karibuni, ETH imekua na thamani kwa watumiaji wa programu za kifedha kwenye Ethereum. Hii ni kwasababu unaweza kutumia ETH kama dhamana kwa ajili ya mikopo ya kripto, au kama mfumo wa ulipaji.
page-eth.page-eth-has-value-desc-5: Bila shaka wengi wanaiona kama sehemu ya uwekezaji, sawa na Bitcoin au sarafu nyingine za kripto.
page-eth.page-eth-is-money: Sarafu ya Ether (ETH) ni ya kidijitali, fedha ya kimataifa.
page-eth.page-eth-no-centralized-desc: ETH imehatuliwa na ni ya ulimwengu. Hakuna kampuni au benki itakayoamua kuchapisha ETH zaidi, au kubalisha masharti ya matumizi.
page-eth.page-eth-not-only-crypto: ETH sio kripto pekee kwenye Ethereum
page-eth.page-eth-not-only-crypto-desc: Mtu yeyote anaweza kuunda aina mpya za mali na kuziuza kwa Ethereum. Hizi zinajulikana kama 'ishara'. Watu wamegeuza sarafu za jadi kwenda kwenye ishara, mali isiohamishika, sanaa, na hata wao wenyewe!
page-eth.page-eth-not-only-crypto-desc-2: Ethereum ni mji wa maelfu ya ishara - nyingine zinamanufaa na thamani kubwa kuliko zingine. Daima wasanidi programu huunda ishara mpya ambazo zinafungua mategemeo mapya na kufungua masoko mapya.
page-eth.page-eth-open-desc: Unahitaji kuwa na mtandao na pochi ili kupokea ETH. Hauhitaji kwenda benkoi ili kupokea malipo.
page-eth.page-eth-p2p-payments-desc: Unaweza kutuma ETh bila kuhitaji huduma ya upatanishi kama benki. Ni kama kumkabidhi mtu pesa uso kwa uso, lakini unaweza kufanya hivyo na mtu yeyote, wahali popote, wakati wowote.
page-eth.page-eth-shit-coins-desc: Kwasababu kutengeneza ishara mpya ni rahisi, mtu yeyote anaweza kufanya - hata watu wenye nia mbaya. Mara zote fanya utafiti wako kabla hujazitumia!
page-eth.page-eth-stablecoins-desc: Ishara zinazofanana na sarfu za jadi kama vile dola. Hii inatatua hali ya tete ya sarafu za kripto.
page-eth.page-eth-underpins: ETH inaimarisha mifumo ya fedha ya Ethereum
page-eth.page-eth-underpins-desc: Haujridhika na malipo, Jamii ya wana-Etehreum inajenga mfumo mzima wa fedha wa mtu-kwa-mtu na utakaopatikana kwa kila mtu.
page-eth.page-eth-underpins-desc-2: Unaweza kutumia ETH kama dhamana kuzalisha ishara za kripto tofauti kabisa juu ya Ethereum. Pamoja na kwamba unaweza kuazima, kukopesha na kupata riba juu ya ETH na ishara zinazobebwa na ETH.
page-eth.page-eth-weth: Ether iliyofungamishwa (WETH) inatumika kuongeza ufanyaji kazi wa ETH kufanya kazi kama tokeni nyinginezo na programu. Jifunze zaidi kuhusu WETH.
page-eth.page-eth-uses: Matumizi ya ETH yanakua kila siku
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc: Kwasababu Ethereum inaweza kusanidiwa, wasanisi programu wanaweza kuiunda ETH katika njia zisizohesabika.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-2: Ukirudi mwaka 2015, ulichokua unaweza kufanya ni kutuma ETH kutoka akaunti moja kwenda nyingine. Hivi hapa ni baadhi ya vitu unavyoweza kufanya leo hii.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-3: lipa mtu au pokea fedha katika muda halisi.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-4: unaweza kufanya biashara ya ETH na ishara zingine ikiwemo Bitcoin.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-5: juu ya ETH na ishara zingine zilizo na misingi ya Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-uses-desc-6: fika katika ulimwengu wa sarafu za kripto kwa uthabiti, thamani iliopungua hali ya utete.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-eth-hero-alt: Kielelezo cha kundi la watu wakiishangaa alama ya ether(ETH) kwa furaha
page-eth.page-eth-whats-eth-meta-desc: Unachohitaji kujua kuielewa ETH na nafasi yake kwenye Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-ethereum-desc: Kama ungependa kujifunza zaidi juu ya Ethereum, teknolojia ilioko nyuma ya ETH, anagalia utangulizi wetu.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-unique: Ni nini cha pekee kwenye ETH?
page-eth.page-eth-whats-unique-desc: Kuna sarafu nyingi za kripto na ishara nyingine nyingi zilizo juu ya Ethereum, lakini kuna baadhi ya vitu ETH pekee ndio inaweza kuyafanya.
page-eth.page-eth-where-to-buy-desc: Unaweza kupata ETH kwenye masoko ya mabadilishano au pochi lakini lakini kila nchi ina sera tofauti. Angalia huduma amabazo zitakuruhusu kununua ETH.
page-eth.page-eth-yours-desc: ETH inafanya unakua benki yako wewe mwenyewe. Unaweza kudhibiti fedha zako na pochi yako kama kithibitisho cha umiliki hamna hitaji la mpatanishi wa kati.
page-eth.page-eth-more-on-tokens: Zaidi juu ya ishara na kazi zake
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-stablecoins-description: Zaidi juu ya ishara zilizo na utete mdogo kwenye Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-defi-description: Mifumo ya kifedha ya ishara za Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-nft-description: Ishara zinazowakilisha umiliki wa kitu juu ya Ethereum.
page-eth.page-eth-tokens-dao-description: Jamii nyingi za mtandaoni hutawaliwa na wanaomiliki ishara hizi.
page-eth.page-eth-whats-defi-description: DeFi ni mifumo ya kifedha iliogatuliwaa iliojengwa juu ya Ethereum. Muhtasari huu unaelezea unachoweza kufanya.

page-gas.page-gas-meta-title: Ada ya gesi kwenye Ethereum: inafanya kazi aje?
page-gas.page-gas-meta-description: Jifunze kuhusu gesi kwenye Ethereum: jinsi inavyofanya kazi na jinsi ya kulipa kidogo zaidi katika ada za gesi
page-gas.page-gas-hero-subtitle-1: Ada ya mtandao kwenye Ethereum inaitwa gesi.
page-gas.page-gas-hero-subtitle-2: Gesi ni mbinu ambayo huipa nguvu Ethereum.
page-gas.page-gas-summary-item-1: Kila muamala kwenye Ethereum unahitaji njia ndogo ya malipo ili kuchakatwa
page-gas.page-gas-summary-item-2: Ada hizi zinajulikana kama ada ya 'gesi'
page-gas.page-gas-summary-item-3: Ada ya gesi azitengenezwi, zinabadilika kutokana na matumizi ya mtandao
page-gas.page-gas-what-are-gas-fees-text-1: Fikiria Ethereum kama mtandao mkubwa wa kompyuta ambapo watu wanaweza kufanya kazi kama kutuma ujumbe au kuendesha programu. Kama kwenye ulimwengu wa kawaida, kazi hizi zinahitaji nishati kuweza kufanyika.
page-gas.page-gas-what-are-gas-fees-text-2: Kwenye Ethereum, kila tendo la hesabu la kompyuta lina kiasi cha bei ya "gesi". Ada yako ya gesi jumla ya gharama ya tendo kwenye muamala wako. Unapotuma muamala au kuendesha mkataba erevu, unalipa gesi kwa ajili ya kuchakata.
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-text: Wakati ada kubwa kwenye Ethereum saa nyingine ni jambo aliepukiki, kuna mikakati unaweza kutumia kupunguza gharama:
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-card-1-ti: Angalia muda wa kufanya muamala wako
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-card-1-de: Kama kusafiri, nje ya barabara kunakuwa na watu wachache na nafuu, Ethereum kwa ujumla ni rahisi kutumia wakati Marekani ya Kasakazini wakiwa wamelala.
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-card-2-de: Bei ya gesi inaenda juu na chini kila sekunde kumi na mbili, sekunde hizo zinahusisha ni namna gani kuna msongamano kwenye Ethereum. Pale ambapo bei ya gesi ipo juu, subiri dakika chache kabla ya kufanya muamala unaweza ona punguzo kwenye utakacho lipa.
page-gas.page-gas-how-do-i-pay-less-gas-card-3-de: Safu ya pili imejengwa juu ya Ethereum, ikitoa ada ndogo na kuthibiti muamala. Ni chaguo zuri la kuweza kuokoa ada kwenye muamala ambayo haihitajiki kutokea kwenye mtandao mkuu wa Ethereum.
page-gas.page-gas-what-causes-high-gas-fees-heade: Nini kinachosababisha ada kubwa ya gesi?
page-gas.page-gas-what-causes-high-gas-fees-text-: Kila ambapo kiasi cha ada ya kufanya hesabu za kompyuta kwenye Ethereum kinakua kimezidi kiasi fulani, ada ya gas inaanza kukua. Jinsi ada ya gesi inavyozidi kiwango, ni rahisi ada ya gesi kuongezeka.

Ada kubwa inaweza kusababishwa na vitu maarufu kama programu gatuzi au tokeni zisizojirudia, mara kwa mara kuongezeka kwa kufanya mabadilishano kwenye DEX, au namba kubwa ya watumiaji na shughuli kuwa cha kiwango cha juu kwa kipindi icho.

Waundaji kwenye Ethereum wanatakiwa kuwa waangalifu kwenye kuboresha mikataba erevu matumizi yake kabla ya kuifanya itumike. Kama watu wengi wanatumia mikataba erevu iliyoandikwa vibaya, itatumia gas nyingi na inaweza sababisha msongomano kwenye mtandao.
page-gas.page-gas-check-out-the-developer-docs: Angalio chapisho kwa ajili ya waundaji.
page-gas.page-gas-attack-of-the-cryptokitties-tex: Mnamo Novemba 2017, mradi maarufu wa Crptokitties ulizalishwa. Mafanikio yake kwenye umaarufu ukaifanya kuwa na msongamano mkubwa kwenye mtandao na ada kubwa ya gesi. Changamoto iliyosababishwa na Cryptokitties ikapelekea uharaka wa kutafuta suluhisho la kupanua Ethereum.
page-gas.page-gas-why-do-we-need-gas-text: Gesi ni kipengele muhimu kuifanya Ethereum salama na kuchakata muamala. Gesi inasaidia kwa njia nyingi:
page-gas.page-gas-benefits-1-description: Gas inaifanya Ethereum kuwa imara zidi utambulisho wa uongo kwa kuzuia watenda ubaya kufanya mahasi kwenye mtandao kwa kufanya vitendo vya ulaghai.
page-gas.page-gas-benefits-2-description: Kwa sababu mahesabu ya kompyuta yanagharimu gesi, kutuma kwa kujirudia na miamala ghali, ikiwa bahati mbaya au kwa nia mbaya, ni vikwazo vya kifedha.
page-gas.page-gas-benefits-3-description: Kikwazo kigumu cha kiwango cha mahesabu ya kompyuta inaweza kufanyika maramoja kuzuia Ethereum kutoka kuelemewa, inasadia kuhakikisha mtandao kila wakati unapatikana.
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-header: Ni jinsi gani gesi inapigiwa mahesabu?
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-text-1: Jumla ya gas unayolipa inatengenezwa na bahazi ya sehemu:
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-item-1: Ada ya msingi: ada inayoekwa na mtandao ambao inahitajika kulipwa a muamala
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-item-2: Ada ya kipaumbele: malipo ya ziada kulipa mwendesha nodi kuweka muamala wako
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-item-3: Vitengo vya gesi iliyotumika kumbuka tumesema gesi inawakilisha mahesabu ya kompyuta? Vitendo vigumu zaidi kama kushughulika na mikataba erevu, inatumia gesi nyingi zaidi ya yenye vitendo virahisi, kama kutuma muamala.
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-list-item: Tazama mchoro 1 kuona kiwango cha gesi mbali mbali na aina ya muamala unaotumika
page-gas.page-gas-how-is-gas-calculated-text-2: Fomula ya kuhesabu kitengo cha ada ya gesi iliyotumika *(ada ya msingi + ada ya kipaumbele). Mikoba migi itahesabu matumizi ya gesi na kuonyesha kwenye njia iliyonyooka.
page-gas.page-gas-table-figure: Mchoro 1: gesi iliyotumika na aina ya muamala
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-1-q: Nani analipwa ada ya gesi kwenye muamala wangu?
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-1-a-1: Kiwango kikubwa cha ada ya gesi ada ya msingi inaharibiwa na itifaki(kuchomwa). Ada ya kipaumbele, kama kimewekwa kwenye muamala wako, atapewa mthibitishaji aliyependekeza muamala wako.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-1-a-2: Unaweza soma maelezo ya kina ya mchakato kwenye chapisho la muunda gesi.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-2-a-1: Ndio. ada yote ya gesi ya Ethereum lazima ilipwe kwenye fedha asili ya ETH.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-3-a-1: Kwenye mikoba mingi au vifuatilia gesi, utaona bei ya dei imeandikwa kama 'gwei'.
page-gas.page-gas-faq-question-3-a-2: Gwei ni kitengo kidogo cha ETH, kama senti ilivyo kwa dola, ikiwa na tofauti kuwa ETH 1 iko sawa na gwei bilioni 1. Gwei ni muhimu pale unapoongea kuhusu kiwango kidogo cha ETH.

page-get-eth.page-get-eth-article-keeping-crypto-safe: Funguo za kuweka crypto salama yako
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-article-protecting-yourself: Jihadhari wewe mwenyewe na fedha zako
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-article-store-digital-asset: Jinsi ya kuhifadhi mali ya dijiti kwenye Ethereum
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-cex-desc: SEhemu za kufanyia mabadilishano ni sehemu za biashara ambazo hukuruhusu kununua kripto kwa kutumia fedha za jadi. Zina ulinzi wa fedhazako zote mpaka pale utakapozituma kwenda kwenye pochi ya Ethereum amabayo utakua unaidhibiti.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-community-safety: Machapisho ya jumuiya juu ya ulinzi
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-description: Ethereum haidhibitiwi na shirika lolote - imegatuliwa.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dex: Sehemu za kufanya mabadilishano ambazo zimegatuliwa(DEXs)
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dex-desc: Kama unataka udhibit zaidi, nunua ETH mikataba erevu. Ukiwa na DEX unaweza kufanya biashara bila kugawia makampuni ya kati nguvu ya udhibiti wako. Mkataba-erevu.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-peers-desc: Pale ambapo unakuwa na akaunti ya Ethereum, kitu unachohitajika kufanya ni kusambaza anwani yako kuanza kutuma na kupokea ETH (na tokeni nyinginezo) mtu-kwa-mtu.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-staking-desc: Kama tayari una kiasi fulani cha ETH, unaweza kupata nyingi zaidi kwa kuendesha nodi ya uthibitishaji. Unalipwa kwa kufanya ivi kwa kuthibitisha kazi ndani ya ETH.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-earn-desc: Unaweza pata ETH kwa kufanyakazi kwenye DAO au kampuni ambazo zinalipa kwa kripto, kushinda zawadi, kutafuta tatizo kwenye programu na zaidi.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs: Sehemu za kufanya mabadilishano ambazo zimegatuliwa(DEXs)
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc: Sehemu za kufanyia mabadilishano zilizogatuliwa ni masoko hurua kwa ETH na ishara nyingine. Zinaunganisha wanunuzi na wauzaji moja kwa moja.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc-2: Badala ya kutumia mhusika wa tatu anayeaminika kulinda fedha kwenye muamala, zinatumia msimbo. ETH ya muuzaji itahamishwa pale amabapo malipo yanadhamana. Aina hii ya msimbo unaitwa mkataba-erevu.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc-3: Hii inamaana kuna vizuizi vya kijografia vichache zaidi ukulinganisha na malipo yalio chini ya serikali au kampuni. Kama mtu anauza kitu unachotaka na wanapokea mfumo wa malipo ulionao, uko vizuri kwenda.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-dexs-desc-4: Kumbuka: dexes nyingi zinatumia ether iliyofungamanishwa (WETH) kufanya kazi. Jifunze zaidi kuhusu ether iliyofungamanishwa.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-disclaimer: Tunekusanya taarifa hizi kwa mikono yetu wenyewe. Ukiona kunakitu ambacho sio sahihi tujulishe kupitia
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-empty-state-text: Ingiza nchi unayoishi ili uone orodha ya sehemu za mabadilishano unayoweza kutumia
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-intro: Sehemu za mabadilisho ya kripto zinavikwazo juu ya sehemu watakapo uza sarafu za kidijitali. Hii ni orodha ya mwelekeo wa huduma zinazozaniwa kufanya kazi kwa kila nchi. Kuwepo hapa sio uidhinishaji unatakiwa kufanya utafiti wako mwenyewe!
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-no-exchanges: Samahani, hatujui sehemu ya mabadilishano itakayokuruhusu kununua ETH kwenye nchi hii. Kama unajua, tujulishe kupitia
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-no-exchanges-or-w: Samahani, hatujui sehemu ya mabadilishano itakayokuruhusu kununua ETH kwenye nchi hii. Kama unajua, tujulishe kupitia
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-no-wallets: Samahani, hatujui sehemu ya mabadilishano au pochi itakayokuruhusu kununua ETH kwenye nchi hii. Kama unajua, tujulishe kupitia
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-success-exchange: Inaweza kuchukua siku kadhaa kujisajili na sehemu za mabalishano kwasababu ya ukaguzi wa kisheria.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-exchanges-success-wallet-pa: Unapoishi, unaweza kununua ETH moja kwa moja kwa kutumia pochi hizi. Jifunze zaidi kuhusu
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-hero-image-alt: Pata picha ya shujaa wa ETH
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-meta-description: Jinsi ya kununua ETH kulingana na eneo unaloishi na ushauri wa jinsi ya kuiangalia.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-new-to-eth: Je wewe ni mgeni katika ETH? Huu hapa ni muhtasari wa kuanzia.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-protect-eth-desc: Moja ya vipengele vikuu vya Ethereum ni kuwa unakua na umiliki wa mali zako mwenyewe kwa kusimamia akaunti yako. Hii inamaanisha hauhitaji kuamini mtu wowote wa ziada na mali zako, na pia unalindwa kutoka kwa uthibiti ambao hufanya uongo, kwenda kufilisika au kudukuliwa. Hata ivyo, inamaanisha unachukua majukumu ya ulinzi kwa ajili yako.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-protect-eth-in-wallet: Weka ETH zako kwenye mkoba wako
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-security: Lakini hii inamaana kwamba unatakiwa kuwa makini na usalama wa fedha zako. Ukiwa na ETH, hautaamini benki au kampuni kulinda pesa zako, unachukua majukumu yako mwenyewe.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-swapping: Badilisha ishara zako kwa ETH za watu wengine. Na kinyume chake.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-use-your-eth-dapps: Sasa kwa kua una pochi, angalia baadhi ya programu za Ethereum (dapps). Kuna dapps za fedha, mitandao ya kijamii, kucheza mtandaoni na vitengo vingine vingi.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-wallet-instructions-lost: Ukishindwa kuingia kwenye mkoba wako, utapoteza ufikiaji wa fedha zako. Mkobwa wako inajukumu la kukupa maelekezo juu ya kujilinda dhidi ya hili swala. Hakikisha unayafuata kwa umakini - Mara nyingi, hamna mtu atakaeweza kukusaidia ukipoteza ufikiaji wa mkoba wako.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-wallets-purchasing: Baadhi ya pochi hukuruhusu kununua kripto kwa kadi ya benki/kadi ya mkopo, uhamisho wa benki kwenda kwenye pochi au hata kwa kutumia malipo ya Apple Pay. Vizuizi vya kijografia vitatumika.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-warning: Hizi DEXs sio kwa ajili ya wanaoanza ambavyo utahitaji kiasi cha ETH ili kuweza kutumia. Hii ni mifano tu, sio bidhaa iliyo idhinishwa. Fanya utafiti wako!
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-where-to-buy-desc: Unaweza lipwa ETH, pokea kutoka kwa watu wako, au nunua kutoka kwenye huduma za mabadilishano na programu.
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-your-address-desc: Utakapopakua pochi itaunda anuani itakayokuwa ya umma kwa ajili yako. Mfano wa jinsi itakavyoonekana huu hapa:
page-get-eth.page-get-eth-your-address-desc-3: Ifikirie hii kama anuani yako ya barua pepe, lakini badala ya barua inaweza kupokea ETH. Kama unataka kuhamisha ETH kutoka kwenye soko la mabadilishano kwenda kwenye pochi yako, tumia anuani yako ya umma. Hakikisha unaikagua mara mbili mbili kabla ya kutuma!

page-index.page-index-activity-description: Shughuli kutoka kwa mitandao yote ya Ethereum
page-index.page-index-bento-assets-content: Sanaa, vyeti au hata mali isiyohamishika inaweza kuwa tokeni. Kitu chochote kinaweza kuwa tokeni inayoweza kuuzwa. Umiliki ni wa umma na unaweza kuthibitishwa.
page-index.page-index-bento-dapps-content: Programu ya ethereum hufanya kazi bila kuuza data yako. Linda faragha yako.
page-index.page-index-bento-defi-content: Mabilioni hawawezi kufungua akaunti za benki au kuwa na uhuru wa kutumia pesa zao. Mfumo wa kifedha wa Ethereum daima uko wazi na hauna upendeleo.
page-index.page-index-bento-networks-content: Ethereum ndio kitovu cha uvumbuzi wa blockchain. Miradi bora zaidi imejengwa kwenye Ethereum.
page-index.page-index-bento-stablecoins-content: Sarafu thabaiti ni sarafu zinazodumisha thamani thabiti. Bei yao inalingana na dola ya Marekani au mali nyingine thabiti.
page-index.page-index-builders-description: Ethereum ni nyumbani kwa mfumo mkuu wa ikolojia wa msanidi programu wa Web3. Tumia JavaScript na Python, au ujifunze lugha mahiri ya mkataba kama Solidity au Vyper ili kuandika programu yako mwenyewe.
page-index.page-index-builders-header: Jumuia kubwa ya wajenzi wa blockchain
page-index.page-index-community-description-1: Tovuti ya ethereum.org imeundwa na kudumishwa na mamia ya wafasiri, waandikaji misimbo, wabunifu, wanakili, na wanajamii walio na shauku kila mwezi.
page-index.page-index-community-description-2: Njoo uulize maswali, ungana na watu duniani kote na uchangie kwenye tovuti. Utapata uzoefu unaofaa wa vitendo na kuongozwa wakati wa mchakato!
page-index.page-index-community-description-3: Jumuiya ya ethereum.org ndio mahali pazuri pa kuanzia na kujifunza.
page-index.page-index-description: Jukwaa linaloongoza la programu bunifu na mitandao ya blockchain
page-index.page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Unda benki inayoendeshwa na mantiki uliyopanga
Unda tokeni ambazo unaweza kuhamisha na kutumia katika programu tofauti
Tumia lugha zilizopo ili kuingiliana na Ethereum na programu zinginezo
Fikiria upya huduma zilizopo kama zilizogatuliwa, programu zilizo wazi
page-index.page-index-developers-code-example-title: Mfumo wa jina la kikoa ulio huru, wala hauhitaji ruhusa
page-index.page-index-events-subtitle: Jumuiya za Ethereum huandaa matukio kote ulimwenguni, kwa mwaka mzima
page-index.page-index-hero-image-alt: Mfano wa mji wa baadaye, unaowakilisha ikolojia ya Ethereum.
page-index.page-index-join-action-contribute-descri: Jua njia zote tofauti unazoweza kusaidia ethereum.org kukua na kuwa bora zaidi.
page-index.page-index-join-action-discord-descripti: Kwa kuuliza maswali, kuratibu mchango na kujiunge na simu za jumuiya.
page-index.page-index-join-action-github-descriptio: Kuchangia kwa kuunda msimbo, muundo, nakala n.k.
page-index.page-index-join-action-twitter-descripti: Kwa kufuata taarifa zetu na habari muhimu.
page-index.page-index-join-description: Tovuti hii ni chanzo kilicho wazi na iliyo na mamia ya wachangiaji wa jumuiya. Unaweza kupendekeza mabadiliko kwa maudhui yoyote kwenye tovuti hii.
page-index.page-index-learn-description: Kripto inaweza kuonekana balaa sana. Usijali, nyenzo hizi zimeundwa ili kukusaidia kuelewa Ethereum kwa dakika chache tu.
page-index.page-index-meta-description: Ethereum ni jukwaa la kimataifa, ambalo halitegemei wamiliki wa madaraka kwa pesa na aina mpya za programu. Kwenye Ethereum, unaweza kuandika msimbo unaodhibiti pesa, na kuunda programu zinazoweza kupatikana mahali popote ulimwenguni.
page-index.page-index-network-stats-total-value-hel: Jumla ya thamani iliyo kwenye Ethereum
page-index.page-index-popular-topics-start: Jinsi ya kuanza, hatua kwa hatua
page-index.page-index-posts-subtitle: Machapisho ya hivi punde zaidi ya blogu na masasisho kutoka kwa jumuiya
page-index.page-index-values-description: Kuwa sehemu ya mabadiliko ya kidijitali
page-index.page-index-values-ownership-legacy-conte: Ukiwa na benki ya kawaida au jukwaa la mitandao ya kijamii, mali na data yako inadhibitiwa na shirika. Unazitegemea kwa ufikiaji na udhibiti.
Wanaweza kutumia data yako kwa njia ambazo huenda hukubaliani nazo, kulingana na sera zao.
page-index.page-index-values-ownership-ethereum-con: Ukiwa na Ethereum, wewe pekee ndiye unayeweza kufikia na kudhibiti. Hakuna mtu mwingine anayepaswa kuwa na uwezo wa kutumia mali yako. Unaweza kuamua ni nani utampa ruhusa hiyo.
page-index.page-index-values-fairness-legacy-conten: Leo, sio kila mtu ana ufikiaji sawa wa huduma za kifedha. Baadhi ya watu wanaweza kukumbana na vizuizi vya kufikia kutokana na eneo au utaifa wao.
page-index.page-index-values-fairness-ethereum-cont: Tunaamini kila mtu anafaa kuruhusiwa kufaidika na mfumo wa kimataifa. Ndiyo maana Ethereum inatoa ufikiaji sawa kwa wote duniani kote, bila kujali wewe ni nani au unatoka wapi.
page-index.page-index-values-privacy-legacy-content: Hatuwezi kutarajia serikali, mashirika, au mashirika mengine makubwa yasiyo na uso kutupatia ufaragha kutokana na manufaa yao.
Programu nyingi hukusanya taarifa zako za kibinafsi iwezekanavyo ili ziweze kukulenga kwa uuzaji unaokufaa.
page-index.page-index-values-privacy-ethereum-conte: Jumuiya ya Ethereum inaheshimu faragha. Una haki ya kutumia programu bila kujidhihirisha au maelezo yako ya mawasiliano.
page-index.page-index-values-integration-legacy-con: Programu nyingi hukusukuma kuunda akaunti tofauti, hivyo kufanya iwe vigumu kukumbuka maelezo yako yote ya kuingia na kusajili.
page-index.page-index-values-integration-ethereum-c: Ukiwa na Ethereum unaweza kutumia tena akaunti moja katika programu zote badala yake. Hakuna usajili wa mtu binafsi unaohitajika.
page-index.page-index-values-decentralization-legac: Makampuni yanamilikiwa na wajasiriamali binafsi na wanahisa. Wao pekee ndio wanaotumia udhibiti wa kampuni na kufaidika zaidi kutokana na mafanikio yake.
page-index.page-index-values-decentralization-ether: Kama ilivyo mtandao wenyewe, Ethereum si mali ya mtu yeyote. Inashirikiwa na imeundwa kwa usawa na wote. Hakuna mmiliki mmoja ambaye angeweza kuidhibiti.
page-index.page-index-values-censorship-legacy-cont: Majukwaa ya kisasa na sheria zake mara nyingi hubadilika. Wanaweza kuathiriwa na washikadau, usimamizi wa kampuni au hata utawala dhalimu.
page-index.page-index-values-censorship-ethereum-co: Upinzani wa ukandamizaji ni kipau mbele ya Ethereum. Utendaji wake unapaswa kuwa wa haki kila wakati na bila upendeleo.
Ethereum haiwezi kudhibitiwa na taifa lolote, kampuni au mtu binafsi.
page-index.page-index-values-open-legacy-content-0: Makampuni hulinda mali zao za kiakili na hazishiriki. Hakuna mtu nje ya kampuni anayeweza kuona jinsi mambo yanavyofanya kazi, kurekebisha matatizo, au kufanya maboresho. Ni vigumu kwa watu kuunda zana mpya au kubinafsisha.
page-index.page-index-values-open-ethereum-content-: Ethereum ni ya umma kwa wote. Mtu yeyote anaweza kuona, kutumia, na kuboresha msimbo, na kuifanya kuwa bora kwa kila mtu.

page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-2-1: Layer 2 (L2) is a collective term to describe a specific set of Ethereum scaling solutions. A layer 2 is a separate blockchain that extends Ethereum and inherits the security guarantees of Ethereum.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-2-2: Now let’s dig into it a bit more. To do this we first need to explain layer 1 (L1).
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-1-1: Layer 1 blockchains, such as Ethereum and Bitcoin, are the underlying foundation that layer 2 projects build on top of. Examples of layer 2 projects include zero-knowledge rollups and optimistic rollups on Ethereum and the Lighting Network on top of Bitcoin.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-what-is-layer-1-2: Ethereum also functions as a data availability layer for Layer 2s, and if there are any disputes on previous transactions data is provided from Ethereum for these disputes.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer-1-list-1: a network of node operators to secure and validate the network
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer-1-list-3: the blockchain itself and the history of transaction data
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-why-do-we-need-layer-: The three desirable properties of a blockchain are that it is decentralized, secure, and scalable. The blockchain trilemma states that a simple blockchain architecture can only achieve two out of three. Want a secure and decentralized blockchain? You need to sacrifice scalability. This is where layer 2 networks come in.

Ethereum has reached the network's current capacity with 1+ million transactions per day, with high demand for each of these transactions. The success of Ethereum and the demand to use it has caused gas prices to rise substantially. Therefore the need for scaling solutions has peaked as well.

The main goal of scalability is to increase transaction speed (faster finality), and transaction throughput (high transactions per second), without sacrificing decentralization or security (more on the Ethereum vision).

The Ethereum community has taken a strong stance that it would not throw out decentralization or security in order to scale. Until sharding, Ethereum Mainnet (layer 1) will only be able to process roughly 15 transactions per second. When demand to use Ethereum is high this causes network congestion, increasing transaction fees, and pricing out those who cannot afford it from using Ethereum until the fees reduce. That is where layer 2 comes in to scale Ethereum today.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer2Cards-1-descrip: By combining multiple transactions into a single transaction on layer 1, transaction fees are massively reduced, making Ethereum more accessible for all.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer2Cards-2-descrip: Layer 2 blockchains settle their transactions on the Ethereum Mainnet, allowing users who use them to benefit from the security of the Ethereum network.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-layer2Cards-3-descrip: With higher transactions per second, lower fees, and new technology, projects will expand into new applications with improved user experience.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-how-does-layer-2-work: As we mentioned above, layer 2 is a collective term for Ethereum scaling solutions that handle transactions off Ethereum layer 1 while still taking advantage of the robust decentralized security of Ethereum layer 1. A layer 2 is a separate blockchain that extends Ethereum. How does that work?

There are several different types of layer 2, each having their own trade-offs and security models. Layer 2s take the transactional burden away from the layer 1 allowing it to become less congested, and everything becomes more scalable.
Rollups bundle (or 'roll up') hundreds of transactions into a single transaction on layer 1. This distributes the L1 transaction fees across everyone in the rollup, making it cheaper for each user.

The transaction data in the rollup is submitted to layer 1, but the execution is done separately by the rollup. By submitting transaction data onto layer 1, rollups inherit the security of Ethereum. This is because once the data is uploaded to layer 1, reverting a rollup transaction requires reverting Ethereum. There are two different approaches to rollups: optimistic and zero-knowledge - they differ primarily on how this transaction data is submitted to L1.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-rollupCards-optimisti: Optimistic rollups use fault proofs where transactions are assumed to be valid, but can be challenged if an invalid transaction is suspected. If an invalid transaction is suspected, a fault proof is ran to see if this has taken place.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-rollupCards-zk-descri: Zero Knowledge rollups use validity proofs where transactions calculations are computed offchain, and then this data is then supplied to Ethereum Mainnet with a proof of their validity.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-dyor-title: Do your own research: Risks of layer 2
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-dyor-1: Because layer 2 chains inherit security from Ethereum, in an ideal world, they are as safe as L1 Ethereum. However, many of the projects are still young and somewhat experimental. After years of R&D, many of the L2 technologies that will scale Ethereum went live in 2021. This is not to say these L2s are not secure, only that no layer 2 is as battle tested as Ethereum Mainnet. Always do your own research and decide if you're comfortable with any risks involved.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-dyor-2: For more information on the technology, risks and trust assumptions of layer 2s, we recommend checking out L2BEAT, which provides a comprehensive risk assessment framework of each project.
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-note-on-alt-l1-title: A note on alt L1s, sidechains, and validiums
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-note-on-alt-l1-1: Alternative layer 1s have higher throughput and lower transaction fees than Ethereum. These alt L1s have had to sacrifice on security or decentralization in order to achieve higher transactions per second and lower fees. The Ethereum ecosystem is firmly aligned that layer 2 scaling is the only way to solve the scalability trilemma and remain decentralized and secure
page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-note-on-alt-l1-2: Sidechains and validiums are blockchains that allow assets from one blockchain to be bridged over and used on another blockchain. Sidechains and validiums run in parallel with the main chain, and interact with the main chain through bridges, but they do not derive their security or data availability from the main chain. They scale similarly to layer 2s, but have different trust assumptions. They offer lower transaction fees, and higher transaction throughput. More on sidechains and validiums.

page-layer-2-learn.page-layer-2-learn-callout-2-description: Learn how networks differ from each other and how far they have gotten in their development.
